figure_2: Discrepancy in effect estimates between preprint and subsequent journal article of COVID-19 RCTs. RCT, randomized controlled trial; n, number of participants with outcome events; N, number of participants analyzed; CI, confidence interval; D28, day 28; article, peer-reviewed journal; WHO-CPS, World Health Organization Clinical Progression Score
